remarks: Closure of scalar product in a subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lssvscl.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lssvscl.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lssvscl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
lssvscl.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lssvscl $p |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. U ) ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. U ) $.
